name: Order Up Drinks
description:
For 2020 first game jam. Was the first time i used Godot. Cant say I'm a huge fan (coming from Unity), but there were certain things about it that I enjoyed.

chiptune (main music) from Frelon-K at 

https://frelon-k.games

http://frelon-k-music.com

Tried to match the theme of cold with the temperature of the drink.

Your goal is to fill the cup up (at least 85%) and get it within +-5 degrees of the target temp (represented by the green line). Adding water will increase the temp, ice decreases. Though be aware ice will melt adding water and therefore cooling less overall as time goes by. When ready you can press the serve drinks button to finish, or hit the discard drink to start over with a new temp. You get bonus points for how close you are to the target temp, and how full the cup is.
